attributes.action: Start peace in the middle east by recognising the sovereignity of a Palestinian State
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The UK Government should unilaterally  recognise a Palestinian Free State based on the lands currently called Gaza in the middle east. 

It should then pursue this with the EU and then the UN Nations.

It should support this new nation in creating a suitable government and other structures of state. 

It should support this nations' initial growth and allow it to open its external borders freely to the rest of the world as any other free nation.
